title: Support Media Queries level 4 syntax improvements
body: CSS Media Quries Level 4 bring in a bunch of syntactic improvements. They make media queries much more readable and maintainable.

comments.body: Range queries will also prevent the 1px gap between break-points when users zoom, see http://damienclarke.me/code/posts/those-1px-gaps-between-media-queries-can-be-a-problem
